text: Beilschmiedia ambigua is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Distribution== Beilschmiedia ambigua is found in the Marungu highlands, along the Pweto and Moba roads, and also along the western shores of Lake Tanganyika. ==Threats== One concern for the Beilschmiedia ambigua species is that its native habitat has become degraded by logging, and the stream banks have become eroded by cattle. ==References== ambigua Category:Endemic flora of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Beilschmiedia ambigua
